name: Enter the Woods
description:
When you  crash your wagon in the middle of the woods, a little girl and a strange compass appear. Who is she? What kind of monsters lurk in the woods?

This is the very first game that I have ever created. It was developed in a time period of 6 weeks.  I know it is not perfect, and the original idea of the game was way more wider than the content I was actually able to implement on it, but in the end, I am actually quite happy with the result.

If you find any kind of bug, or just want to express how you feel about the game, please feel free to post your thoughts in the comments! Any kind of feedback is highly appreciated! 

Enjoy! ;)
